content:
Electric Daisy Carnival，简称EDC，是世界三大电子音乐节之一。EDC的主题与 Tomorrowland的奇幻风格略有不同，强调爱与包容，并且在LED灯光的使用上更加多样化。 每年其最大规模的活动在内华达州的拉斯维加斯举办，流行电音制作人和DJ在各地的EDC登台演出。EDC举办范围覆盖美国多地：加利福尼亚、科罗拉多、佛罗里达州，伊利诺斯、内华达州、新泽西、纽约、德克萨斯等。2018年，EDC在上海成功举办。

 

EDC参演包括世界各地流行电音制作人和DJ：Armin van Buuren，Calvin Harris，Diplo，Alesso，Dillon Francis，Martin Garrix，Zedd，Afrojack，NGHTMRE，Yellow Claw和Tiësto等。电音节包括了各种电子音乐潮流，包括HOUSE，TECHNO，dubstep，Trap等。

 

EDC旨在利用音乐和艺术鼓励人的个性发展。除了音乐之外，在EDC中我们还可以体验到实实在在的精神享受，包括色彩斑斓的黑暗中发光以及LED做成的的各种动植物。还有就是遍布EDC现场的的互动艺术装置，在人群中行走的各种狂欢节表演者以及各种激动人心和纾解压力的的狂欢节游乐设施。EDC希望可以成为人们在舞池内外沟通的桥梁。

 

自成立以来，其他EDC活动已在其他州和国外举行，包括墨西哥，波多黎各，英国，巴西，日本和印度。目前，EDC与主要的拉斯维加斯活动一起每年在奥兰多，中国和墨西哥举行。

 

在2009年，EDC成为了为期两天的活动，在2011年，为期三天的活动吸引了23万人参加。2015年，它在三天内吸引了超过40万（每天13.4万）。 在2018年，拉斯维加斯EDC将音乐节扩大到包括现场露营体验。

 

2017年，EDC在电子音乐奖中获得了年度音乐节奖。

 

历史

首届EDC于1991年举行，首次由Stephen Hauptfuhr组织。Philip Blaine——Hauptfuhr的合伙人——于1995年与Insomniac Events的CEO Pasqualle Rotella达成协议，获得"Electric Daisy Carnival"名称授权。

 

1997年，Insomniac在加州洛杉矶神社博览馆首次举办他们的标志性活动——EDC。早些年，南加州的几个场馆主办了这个一年一度的电子音乐节：洛杉矶纪念体育馆和博览会公园、圣贝纳迪诺国家橙色表演活动中心、长滩玛丽女王活动公园、巴斯托多洛雷斯湖水上乐园、湖景露台汉森大坝和图拉雷国际农业中心。

 

1999

EDC在加州纽贝里斯普林斯的多洛雷斯湖水上乐园举行。音乐节首次在多洛雷斯湖水上乐园的一个小场地举行，名为Insomniac。

 

2000

EDC搬到图拉雷，加利福尼亚州的世界农业博览会举办。

 

2001

EDC在南加州汉森大坝举行，首次扩展到多舞台：the Merry Go Round, the Fun House, Clown Alley, the Confusin’ & Amuzin’ Mirror Maze, Bassrush Arena和Cosmic Healing Temple。

 

同年，又在德克萨斯州奥斯汀市举行了另一场EDC演出。

 

2002-2006

2002年EDC活动在加州长滩玛丽皇后活动公园举行。第二届在德克萨斯州奥斯汀的特拉维斯县博览会中心举行。

 

2003年至2006年，EDC在加州圣贝纳迪诺的NOS活动中心举行。

 

2007

EDC在洛杉矶展览公园的洛杉矶体育馆举行。

 

2008

加州活动于6月28日在洛杉矶纪念体育馆和展览公园举行。EDC科罗拉多活动于6月14日在奥罗拉的阿拉帕霍县集市举行。

 

2009

在2008年的夜间音乐节上，EDC透露了在加利福尼亚举办为期两天的音乐节的计划。活动于6月26日至27日举行。周五，约有55，000人出席，周六约有99，000人出席。 EDC 2009 在洛杉矶纪念体育馆举行，并使用了整个展览公园的南半部。

 

科罗拉多活动于6月13日在奥罗拉的阿拉帕霍县集市举行。Infected Mushroom，aul Van Dyk等音乐人受到关注。

 

波多黎各的EDC于8月14日举行，地点在圣胡安的竞技场集市。

 

2010

洛杉矶EDC有大约185，000人参加。虽然门票标价为60美元，但一些与会者每张门票的起价超过100美元。

 

EDC允许16岁以下的人参与后引起了地方当局和宣传者的批评，100多名狂欢者在人群踩踏事件后住院治疗。一名15岁的与会者Sasha Rodriguez在服用一种精神活性药物MDMA后死亡。 洛杉矶市暂停定于2010年尚未举办的活动以及今后的活动，等待新的安全和安保规定的结果。新规定包括雇用现场医生，并说与会者必须年满18岁。

 

6月12日，EDC科罗拉多活动在奥罗拉的阿拉帕霍县集市举行。

 

EDC达拉斯活动于6月19日在达拉斯的费尔公园举行。有11，000人出席。

 

EDC波多黎各于2010年8月28日在圣胡安的普埃尔塔德蒂拉的埃斯塔迪奥西斯托埃斯科瓦尔举行。

 

2011

由于此前EDC在洛杉矶的事故存在争议，EDC将其顶级音乐节迁至内华达州拉斯维加斯。 活动于 6 月 24 日至 26 日在拉斯维加斯高速公路举行。据报道，有23万人参加了为期3天的节日。

 

EDC奥兰多2011年5月27日至28日在丁克球场举行，场地毗邻佛罗里达柑橘碗，周五大约有12，000观众，周六有20，000。

 

同年6月11日，科罗拉多EDC在奥罗拉的阿拉帕霍县集市举行。

 

6月18日，达拉斯的EDC在费尔公园举行，估计有25，000人参加。温度超过110度导致数十人住院，至少一人死亡，这使得它成为最后一次在达拉斯举行的EDC。

 

2012

2012 年，在拉斯维加斯举行的为期三天的 EDC（6 月 8 日至 10 日）的参与人数增加了 30%，达到 32 万人。6月11日，一名来自佛罗里达州的31岁男子在拉斯维加斯高速公路离开EDC时被一辆卡车撞死，其朋友称说他一直在喝酒抽烟。

 

第二个晚上由于始于晚上8点左右高达30英里每小时的大风，音乐节不得不在凌晨1点结束。90，000名粉丝被引导到高速公路的露天座位。DJs Markus Schulz和Steve AokiDJ都预计当晚演出，在Insomniac Wide Awake即兴设置的艺术车进行表演，这是一个更小的可移动舞台。官方下令，由于五点前潜在的大风预警，关停音乐节。在这段时间内，DJ们在这个小舞台上演出。为了弥补取消演出给观众的损失，Insomniac允许那些有星期六通行证的人在周日返回。

 

EDC奥兰多于11月9日至10日在丁克球场举行。这与一年一度在佛罗里达州劳德代尔堡举行的感恩节周末Daylow活动同时。

 

EDC纽约分会于5月18日至20日在新泽西州东卢瑟福的梅多兰兹体育中心大都会人寿体育场举行。 虽然会场位于新泽西州，但由于靠近纽约市，该节日被称为纽约EDC。 活动每天吸引45，000人参加。

 

2013

EDC拉斯维加斯酒店于6月21日至23日举行。

 

2013年，EDC首次在伦敦举行，同时在芝加哥、纽约、圣胡安、波多黎各和佛罗里达州奥兰多举办了活动。

 

2014

2014年6月20日至22日，EDC在拉斯维加斯高速公路举行。 Insomniac Events宣布，截至2014年6月18日，为期三天的音乐节门票已全部售出。 在2014年活动结束时，为期三天的盛大节日每天吸引约134，000人参加。

 

此次活动的设置也使Insomniac创造了北美最大的结构阶段的纪录。

 

EDC活动还在米尔顿凯恩斯，英格兰，圣胡安，奥兰多，佛罗里达州和纽约举行。

 

首届EDC墨西哥于2014年3月15日至16日举行。

 

一部名为Under the Electric Sky 的纪录片在2014年圣丹斯电影节上首映。

 

2015

EDC拉斯维加斯2015年于6月19日，20日至21日在内华达州拉斯维加斯的拉斯维加斯赛车场举行。 EDC拉斯维加斯2015年遇到了负面事件，一名加州大学欧文分校毕业生在节日的第二个晚上死亡。死亡被裁定为与MDMA有关，MDMA有脱水和体温升高的副作用。

 

EDC还于11月6日至7日在佛罗里达州奥兰多的丁克球场举行，5月23日至24日在新泽西州东卢瑟福大都会人寿体育场举行。 国际上，EDC于2月21日至22日在波多黎各圣胡安的埃斯塔迪奥·西斯托·埃斯科瓦尔举行第六次， 12月4日和5日，在巴西圣保罗的奥特德罗莫·何塞·卡洛斯·佩斯第二次，墨西哥墨西哥城的Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez于2月28日—3月1日举行第二次，7月17日在英国米尔顿凯恩斯举行第三次。

 

2016

EDC拉斯维加斯于2016年6月17日至19日在拉斯维加斯高速公路举行。活动DJMarshmello 脱下头盔的花招，扮成荷兰DJ Tiësto。

 

2016年2月27日至28日，墨西哥EDC第三次在墨西哥城 Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez举行。

 

EDC纽约于2016年5月14日至15日在纽约皇后区的花旗球场举行。

 

EDC英国于2016年7月9日在英国米尔顿凯恩斯举行。

 

EDC奥兰多于2016年11月4日至5日在佛罗里达州奥兰多的丁克球场举行。

 

EDC印度站于2016年11月12日至13日在印度新德里的布德国际赛车场举行。

 

2017

EDC从6月返回拉斯维加斯高速公路，开幕当晚有超过135，000人参加。 [42]与热有关的健康事件显著增加，与医疗相关的电话同比增加一倍。一名34岁男子服用MDMA和TFMPP后死亡，这种药物与MDMA相似，热暴露是一个促成因素。 

 

2月25日至26日，EDC第四次在墨西哥城的奥特德罗莫·赫尔马诺斯·罗德里格斯举行。

 

原定于2017年7月在英国米尔顿凯恩斯举行的EDC英国被取消。

 

EDC奥兰多2017年于2017年11月10日至11日在丁克球场举行。

 

2018

EDC奥兰多于2018年11月9日至10日在丁克球场举行。

 

EDC拉斯维加斯于5月18日至20日在拉斯维加斯高速公路举行（传统为6月），以便在相对凉爽的条件下举行。期间还推出了现场露营（包括可租露营者和房车停车场）和提前开放时间，以减少交通拥堵。 三天来，估计有411，400人参加音乐节。

 

EDC墨西哥计划于2月24-25日在墨西哥城的Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez举行。

 

EDC日本举行于5月12日至13日在东京千叶海滨公园佐佐海洋体育场。大雨造成设备问题。

 

EDC中国上海，4月29日至30日，在上海国际音乐园首演。

 

2019

2019年5月17-19日，EDC拉斯维加斯返回拉斯维加斯高速公路。第二天，大风迫使舞台关闭。由于屏幕上显示的消息的措辞，以及播放的音频消息指示他们"躲在车内"，导致一些参与者相信，音乐节会整夜关闭，随后离开了高速公路。在出口处得知只有某些区域因安全防范措施而关闭后，一些人试图重新进入场地，但由于音乐节严格的禁止再入政策，不允许他们返回。 拉斯维加斯警方在音乐节期间宣布了65人被捕，包括2名DUI和51名重罪或严重轻罪。

 

2019年2月23-24日，EDC墨西哥返回墨西哥城的Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez。

 

EDC奥兰多现在举行3天，而不是通常的2天。它将留在丁克球场，露营世界体育场外。

 

EDC日本于2019年5月11日至12日在东京佐佐海洋体育场和马库哈里海滩公园举行。

 

EDC韩国于8月31日至9月1日在韩国格瓦琼的首尔土地举行。

 

2020

EDC墨西哥于2020年2月28日至3月2日在墨西哥城的奥特德罗莫·赫尔马诺斯·罗德里格斯举行。

 

据宣布，2020年音乐节将利用更多的拉斯维加斯高速公路场地，罗泰拉指出，高速公路已经移除大量的房车的水电连通，使该地区的某些地区无法使用。 音乐节原定于5月15日至17日举行，但改在10月2日至4日举行。然而，在2020年7月，由于COVID-19，音乐节被迫取消。 在原定的日期期间，在Twitch和YouTube上直播了一个虚拟音乐节。

 

2021

EDC拉斯维加斯定于10月22日至24日举行。 虽然活动原定于5月21日至23日举行，但克拉克县于4月20日通过了一项重新开放计划，要求60%的居民接种疫苗，然后才能取消对EDC等大型集会的限制。Insomniac Events的CEO Pasquale Rotella 在社交媒体上发表声明说："不幸的是，人们接种疫苗的速度在EDC之前已经失控。它可能是及时的，也可能并不是。无论是哪个，我们不能冒这个险。”

 

慈善

对于每举办一次旗舰节日，Insomniac Care都会向国家慈善机构和社区组织捐赠一定比例的门票销售。过去，EDC Las Vegas 曾与超现实（一个筹款平台）合作，从参加直升机旅行和其他与流行 DJ 一起参加抽奖活动的节日游客那里筹集资金。部分组织如下：

Rock the Vote

Families for Effective Autism Treatment

Injured Police Officers Fund

Boys and Girls Club of Southern Nevada

Nevada Childhood Cancer Foundation

The Las Vegas Academy for Arts
contentEn:
Electric Daisy Carnival, commonly known as EDC, is the largest electronic dance music festival in North America.[1] The annual flagship event is now held in May, at the Las Vegas Motor Speedway and Orlando.

 

The event primarily features electronic dance producers and DJs, such as Armin van Buuren, Calvin Harris, Diplo, Alesso, Dillon Francis, Martin Garrix, Zedd, Afrojack, Seven Lions, NGHTMRE, Yellow Claw, and Tiësto. The festival incorporates a variety of electronic music, including house, techno, drum and bass, and dubstep.[2] Sponsors of the most recent EDC events include Corona, Smirnoff, Uber and Tinder.[3]

 

EDC was created with the purpose of utilizing music and art to inspire individuals. In addition to the music, individuals experience three-dimensional superstructures, colorful glow-in-the-dark environments, and LED-infused flora and fauna.[4] Part of the experience are the interactive art installations scattered throughout EDC, the various carnival performers that walk around the crowds, and a variety of both thrilling and relaxing carnival rides.[4] The goal is ultimately for EDC to be a place where people can connect, on and off the dance floor.[4]

 

Since its inception, other EDC events have been held in other states and abroad, including Mexico, Puerto Rico, the UK, Brazil, Japan and India. Currently, EDC is held annually in Orlando, China, and Mexico, along with the main Las Vegas event.[5]

 

In 2009, EDC became a two-day event, and in 2011, a three-day event that drew 230,000 people. In 2015, it drew more than 400,000 over three days (134,000 per day).[6][7][8] In 2018, EDC Las Vegas expanded the festival to include an on-site camping experience. Recent iterations of the festival have featured eight stages, each with a unique set and specific genre of EDM.[9] 18 carnival rides, four ferris wheels, and a staff of more than 5,000 people make up the event at the Las Vegas Motor Speedway.[10] In 2019 access to purchasing tickets to EDC was expanded to mobile phone apps for convenience.

 

In 2017, EDC won the Festival of the Year award at the Electronic Music Awards.

 

History

The first Electric Daisy Carnival was held in 1991, and was first organized by Stephen Hauptfuhr. Philip Blaine—Pasquale's partner—made the deal to grant use of the name Electric Daisy Carnival in 1995 to Pasqualle Rotella CEO of Insomniac Events.

 

Insomniac debuted their signature event, Electric Daisy Carnival, in 1997 at the Shrine Expo Hall in Los Angeles, California.[11] In the early years, several southern California venues played host to the annual electronic music festival: Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum and Exposition Park in Los Angeles, National Orange Show Events Center in San Bernardino, Queen Mary Events Park in Long Beach, Lake Dolores Waterpark in Barstow, Hansen Dam in Lake View Terrace, and the International Agri-Center in Tulare.

 

1999

Electric Daisy Carnival took place at Lake Dolores Waterpark in Newberry Springs, California. The festival first took place at a small venue at Lake Dolores Waterpark, called Insomniac.

 

2000

The Electric Daisy Carnival moves to Tulare, California, at the World Ag Expo.

 

2001

Electric Daisy Carnival was held at Hansen Dam in Southern California, expanding for the first time to multiple stages: the Merry Go Round, the Fun House, Clown Alley, the Confusin’ & Amuzin’ Mirror Maze, Bassrush Arena and Cosmic Healing Temple.

 

In the same year, another EDC was held in Austin, Texas.

 

2002 – 2006

EDC 2002 was held at Queen Mary Events Park in Long Beach, California. A second edition was held at the Travis County Exposition Center in Austin, Texas.

 

From 2003 to 2006, Electric Daisy Carnival was held at the NOS Events Center in San Bernardino, California.

 

2007

Electric Daisy Carnival was held at the L.A. Coliseum in Los Angeles’ Exposition Park.[12]

 

2008

The California event was held June 28 at the Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum and Exposition Park. The EDC Colorado event took place on June 14 at the Arapahoe County Fairgrounds in Aurora.[13]

 

2009

At the Nocturnal Festival in 2008, EDC revealed its plan to host a two-day festival in California. The event was held on June 26–27. On Friday, approximately 55,000 attendees were present and Saturday saw a crowd of approximately 99,000.[14] EDC 2009 was held at the Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum and used the entire southern half of Exposition Park.

 

The Colorado event was held at the Arapahoe County Fairgrounds in Aurora on June 13. It was headlined by Infected Mushroom, Paul Van Dyk, and several others.

 

EDC Puerto Rico was held on August 14. The venue was The Arena Fairgrounds in San Juan.

 

2010

EDC Los Angeles had an attendance of about 185,000 people. Though tickets were starting at $60, some attendees paid over $100 per ticket.[15]

 

It drew criticism from local authorities and promoters after people under the required age of 16 gained entrance, and more than 100 ravers were hospitalized after a crowd stampede. A 15-year-old attendee, Sasha Rodriguez, died after taking MDMA, a psychoactive drug.[16] The city of Los Angeles placed a suspension on all remaining events scheduled for 2010 and for future events, pending the outcome of the new security and safety provisions. The new provisions included the hiring of on-site doctors, and stated attendees must be over 18 years of age.

 

An EDC Colorado event was held on June 12 at the Arapahoe County Fairground in Aurora.

 

EDC Dallas was held on June 19 at Fair Park in Dallas. 11,000 people were in attendance.

 

EDC Puerto Rico was held on August 28, 2010, at the Estadio Sixto Escobar at Puerta de Tierra, San Juan.

 

2011

Due to previous controversy of EDC's former residence in Los Angeles, EDC moved its flagship festival to Las Vegas, Nevada.[17] The event was held at the Las Vegas Motor Speedway from June 24–26. Reportedly 230,000 people had attended the 3 day festival.
 

EDC Orlando 2011 was held on May 27–28 at Tinker Field, and the grounds adjacent to the Florida Citrus Bowl.[18] EDC Orlando 2011 had approximately 12,000 on Friday and 20,000 on Saturday.[19]

 

EDC Colorado the same year was held at the Arapahoe County Fairgrounds in Aurora on June 11.

Electric Daisy Carnival Dallas was held June 18 at Fair Park with an estimated 25,000 attendees. Temperatures above 110 degrees led to dozens of hospitalizations and at least one death, which made it the last EDC held in Dallas.

 

EDC Puerto Rico took place on August 27.

 

2012

In 2012, the three-day EDC in Vegas (June 8–10) saw attendance increase by 30%, to a total of 320,000 attendees.[20] A 31-year-old male from Florida died after being struck by a truck as he left EDC at the Las Vegas Motor Speedway on June 11. Friends reported that he had been drinking and smoking.[21]

 

The second night had to shut down early at 1 a.m. due to high winds, of up to 30 MPH that started around 8 p.m.[22] 90,000 fans were directed to the speedway's bleachers. DJs Markus Schulz and Steve Aoki, who were both scheduled to play that night, performed impromptu sets on the Insomniac Wide Awake art car, a much smaller, mobile stage, for a short period,[23] before officials ordered it to close as potentially dangerous winds were expected until 5 a.m.[24] In order to make up for the cancellation, Insomniac allowed those with Saturday passes to return on Sunday.[25]

 

EDC Orlando was held at Tinker Field on November 9–10. This coincided with the annual Dayglow event in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, called "Dancegiving" held the weekend after Thanksgiving.

 

EDC New York was held May 18–20 at the MetLife Stadium at the Meadowlands Sports Complex in East Rutherford, New Jersey.[26] Although the venue was located in New Jersey, the festival was coined Electric Daisy Carnival New York due to the proximity to New York City.[27] The event drew 45,000 attendees per day.[28]

 

2013

EDC Las Vegas was held June 21–23.

 

In 2013, EDC was held in London for the first time, along with events in Chicago, New York, San Juan, Puerto Rico, and Orlando, Florida.

 

2014

In 2014, EDC was held at the Las Vegas Motor Speedway on June 20–22, 2014. Insomniac Events announced that all 345,000 tickets to the three-day festival had been sold by June 18, 2014.[29] At the conclusion of the 2014 event, the massive three-day festival drew in roughly 134,000 per day.[30]

 

The setup at the event also led Insomniac to set the record for the largest structural stage in North America.[31]

 

EDC events were also held in Milton Keynes, England, San Juan, Orlando, Florida, and New York.

 

The first EDC Mexico was held on March 15–16, 2014.[32]

 

A documentary film called Under the Electric Sky about the festival premiered at the 2014 Sundance Film Festival.[33]

 

2015

EDC Las Vegas 2015 was held in Las Vegas, Nevada, at the Las Vegas Motor Speedway on June 19, 20 & 21.[34] EDC Las Vegas 2015 was met with unwanted publicity for the death of a UC Irvine graduate on the second night of the festival. Death was ruled as related to MDMA, which has side effects of dehydration and increase in body temperature.[35]

 

EDC was also held at Orlando, Florida at Tinker Field on November 6 & 7, and East Rutherford, New Jersey at MetLife Stadium on May 23 & 24.[36][37] Internationally, EDC was held at Estadio Sixto Escobar in San Juan, Puerto Rico for the sixth time on February 21 & 22,[38] Autódromo José Carlos Pace in São Paulo, Brazil for the first time December 4 & 5,[39] Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez in Mexico City, Mexico for the second time on February 28 – March 1,[40] and the National Bowl in Milton Keynes, UK for the third time on July 17.[41]

 

2016

EDC Mexico was held for the third time at Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez in Mexico City, from February 27–28, 2016.EDC Las Vegas was held at Las Vegas Motor Speedway from June 17–19, 2016. The event saw DJ Marshmello removing his helmet in a gimmick to be the Dutch DJ Tiësto.

 

EDC New York was held at Citi Field in Queens, NY, from May 14–15, 2016.

 

EDC UK was held at Milton Keynes, England on 9 July 2016.

 

EDC Orlando was held at Tinker Field in Orlando, Florida, from November 4–5, 2016.

 

EDC India was held at Buddh International Circuit in New Delhi, India, from November 12–13, 2016.

 

2017

EDC returned to the Las Vegas Motor Speedway from June, with over 135,000 attendees on opening night.[42] Heat-related health incidents saw a significant increase, with double the medical-related calls on opening night year-over-year. A 34-year-old man died after taking MDMA and TFMPP, a drug similar to MDMA, with heat exposure as a contributing factor.[43][44]

 

EDC was held for the fourth time in Mexico City at Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez from 25 to 26 February.[45]

 

EDC UK 2017, due to be held at Milton Keynes, England in July 2017, was cancelled.[46]

 

EDC Orlando 2017 was held at Tinker Field on November 10–11, 2017.[47]

 

2018

EDC Orlando was held at Tinker Field from November 9–10, 2018.

 

EDC Las Vegas was held at the Las Vegas Motor Speedway from May 18–20; the festival was moved from its traditional June scheduling so that it will be held in relatively cooler conditions. The festival also introduced on-site camping (including rentable campers and RV parking) and earlier opening times in order to reduce traffic congestion.[48][49] An estimated 411,400 people attended the festival over the three days.[50]

 

EDC Mexico in Mexico City was planned for February 24–25 at Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez.[51]

 

EDC Japan was held in Tokyo, May 12 & 13 at Chiba Seaside Park Zozo Marine Stadium. Heavy Rains caused equipment issues.[52]

 

EDC China in Shanghai, April 29 & 30, debut at Shanghai International Music Park.

 

2019

EDC Las Vegas returned to the Las Vegas Motor Speedway for May 17–19, 2019. On the second day, high winds forced stage closures. Due to wording of the message displayed on screens, and the played audio message instructing them to "take cover in your car", some attendees were lead to believe that the entire festival was being shut down for the night and subsequently left the speedway. Upon learning at the exit that only certain areas were closed for safety precautions some people tried to re-enter the grounds but were not allowed back in due to the event's strict no-reentry policy.[53] Las Vegas police announced 65 arrests during the festival, including 2 DUIs and 51 felony or gross misdemeanor arrests.[54]

 

EDC Mexico in Mexico City returned to Autodromo Hermanos Rodriguez for February 23–24, 2019.[55]

 

EDC Orlando is now held for 3 days, instead of the normal 2 days. It will remain at Tinker Field, outside of Camping World Stadium.

 

EDC Japan was held in Tokyo, May 11 & 12, 2019 at ZOZO Marine Stadium & Makuhari Beach Park.[56]

 

EDC Korea was held on 31 August & 1 September at Seoul Land, Gwacheon, South Korea.

 

2020

EDC Mexico in Mexico City was held at Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez for February 28–March 2, 2020.

 

It was announced that the 2020 festival would utilize more of the Las Vegas Motor Speedway grounds, with Rotella pointing out that the speedway had removed a large number of RV hookups that had made certain areas of the area unusable.[57] The festival was originally scheduled to take place from May 15–17, but was rescheduled for October 2–4. However, in July 2020, the festival was cancelled due to COVID-19 pandemic.[58] A virtual festival, streamed live on Twitch and YouTube, took place during the original scheduled dates.[59]

 

2021

EDC Las Vegas is scheduled to take place from October 22-24.[60] While the event was originally scheduled to be held from May 21-23, Clark County on April 20 passed a reopening plan that requires 60% of their residents to be vaccinated before restrictions over large scale gatherings such as EDC can be lifted.[61] In a statement released on social media, Insomniac Events CEO Pasquale Rotella stated, "Unfortunately, the rate at which people get vaccinated before EDC is out of our control. It might happen in time, it might not. Either way, we can’t take that risk."[62]

 

Charity

For every flagship festival held, Insomniac Care donates a percentage of ticket sales to national charities and community organizations. In the past, EDC Las Vegas has partnered with Surreal, a fundraising platform, to raise money from festival goers who enter in a sweepstake for helicopter rides and other activities with popular DJs.[63] Since 2011, over two million dollars have been donated to groups. Some organizations are named below.[64]

  • Rock the Vote
  • Families for Effective Autism Treatment
  • Injured Police Officers Fund
  • Boys and Girls Club of Southern Nevada
  • Nevada Childhood Cancer Foundation
  • The Las Vegas Academy for Arts

remarks:
本词条汉字内容由 @多频百科团队 翻译+编辑
原文译自 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Electric_Daisy_Carnival
name: Electric Daisy Carnival
descriptions: Electric Daisy Carnival，简称EDC，是世界三大电子音乐节之一。EDC的主题与 Tomorrowland的奇幻风格略有不同，强调爱与包容，并且在LED灯光的使用上更加多样化。 每年其最大规模的活动在内华达州的拉斯维加斯举办，流行电音制作人和DJ在各地的EDC登台演出。EDC举办范围覆盖美国多地：加利福尼亚、科罗拉多、佛罗里达州，伊利诺斯、内华达州、新泽西、纽约、德克萨斯等。2018年，EDC在上海成功举办。
holdAddress: Las Vegas, Nevada, all of the world
